types:type.name: validatingJson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type validatingJson = {| std_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, gender: String, doj: String, city: String |} {"example": "{\\\"std_id\\\":100,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ranjith\\\",\\\"age\\\":20,\\\"gender\\\":\\\"M\\\",\\\"doj\\\":\\\"1994-08-19\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"vki\\\"}"}
